APEncoder.PixelEncoder

Constructs a new PixelEncoder.

Method Detail

encode

public int encode(Bitmap masterblock,
                  byte[] buffer,
                  int startPos)
Encodes pixel data of masterblock by run-length encoding.

Parameters:
masterblock - masterblock to be encoded.
buffer - buffer to write the encoded data.
startPos - start position of writing the encoded data.
Returns:
number of encoded bytes written.
